接口 CommentDao

所有超级接口:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Comment,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Comment,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Comment>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Comment,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Comment>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Comment,​java.lang.Long>
@Repository
public interface CommentDao
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Comment,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Comment>
